title: TestCaseSketch
description: A design-time test case specification that selects concrete input partition values for a CoverageRequirement, serving as the bridge between test design (InputPartitionSelection) and executable test case specification per IEEE 829-2008. Exists in sketch (unimplemented) or implemented status — not yet tied to a specific test runner or execution framework.

status.description: Lifecycle status of the test case sketch

inputSelections.description: References InputPartitionSelection nodes specifying which partition values this sketch exercises.

implementationFormat.description: How the test case will be executed

source.description: Source code reference to the test case implementation
